name: Potion overdose
description:
Yer' a wizard, Ha... ahem.

I mean, you're a wizard in search for potions that get you overdosed and then defeat the office zombies that lurk in the dungeon.

Use arrows to move/jump, Z to drink a potion.

This is a prototype so it may or may not present issues :p

Music by Dobi (Gerry Brazell)

Art by Drooms (John Douglas)

Sound fx by Redbadger (Nick Reedy)

Programming by Jevisan, aka me
